name: Vita Data
overview:
Vita Data is fast becoming the leading provider of Irish consumer lifestyle data for sales, market research and multi-channel direct marketing.

Vita Data grounds its work in consumer data and we are pioneering the collection of permission data to deliver value solutions to our clients. Consumer acquisition and consumer insights are our business, we’ll help you implement and manage new initiatives and campaigns – creating loyalty that is both targeted and responsive. Vita Data gives you the opportunity to target active consumers. Our comprehensive customer satisfaction and lifestyle surveys cover a wide spectrum of tastes, opinions, insights and budgets, with an excellent selection of lifestyle variables to choose from we can eliminate the time and money wasted by using wrong, inaccurate data.
